meanings.sent1: The cochleate seashell was beautifully curved.
meanings.sent2: The cochleate staircase wound gracefully upwards.
meanings.sent3: The cochleate seashell rolled comically down the sandy beach.
meanings.sent4: Her hair, cochleate and flowing, resembled a cascade of curls.
meanings.sent5: The cochleate design of the building's exterior made it stand out from the rest.

meanings.definition: Coiled or twisted in a spiral shape.
meanings.sent1: The cochleate wire was tightly wound around the pole.
meanings.sent2: The cochleate snake slithered through the grass.
meanings.sent3: The cochleate ribbon danced playfully in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were cochleate, swirling around in confusion.
meanings.sent5: The cochleate pattern on the rug added a touch of elegance to the room.
